pageProps.title: Holmes
pageProps.teaser: Information extraction from English and German texts based on predicate logic

data.title: Holmes
data.slogan: Information extraction from English and German texts based on predicate logic
data.description: Holmes is a Python 3 library that supports a number of use cases involving information extraction from English and German texts, including chatbot, structural extraction, topic matching and supervised document classification. There is a [website demonstrating intelligent search based on topic matching](https://holmes-demo.explosion.services).
code_example: holmes_manager.register_search_phrase('A big dog chases a cat')
data.author: Richard Paul Hudson
